Generalist set for Kaveh, usually used in Nilou Bloom teams. He is also a viable driver for burgeon oder hyperbloom even if he does not buff those reactions.

Putting Ocean-Hued Clam on someone who isn't a healer may seem counterintuitive at first, but Kaveh's Passive allows him to heal when getting hit by an exploding Dendro Core. This effect gets even stronger once you have his first Constellation. By staying on field for most of the time, Kaveh can utilize the Clam's damaging effect and from C1 onwards deals higher DPS than with Deepwood Memories this way. You should still make sure, however, that at least one of your party members is wearing Deepwood Memories for its resistance shred.
This build focusses let's you play Kaveh in a Spread team but can also be used for Hyperbloom or Burgeon. Make sure someone else in your party has deepwood.
Thundersoother as good as thundering fury
